snippet: ADLER--Nathan L. Beloved husband of the late Genecia. Loving father of Raphael and Seth. Dear father-in-law of Francine and Michele. Cherished grandfather of Robert, Efraim, Matthew, Benjamin, Adam and Alanna. Proud WWII Veteran....

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ADLER, NATHAN L

lead_paragraph: ADLER--Nathan L. Beloved husband of the late Genecia. Loving father of Raphael and Seth. Dear father-in-law of Francine and Michele. Cherished grandfather of Robert, Efraim, Matthew, Benjamin, Adam and Alanna. Proud WWII Veteran.
